subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: The days of 142-0 thrashings in the Rugby World Cup seem to be over, as lesser teams like Namibia, the United States, Romania and Japan have given bigger teams a scare in early games.
snippet: The days of 142-0 thrashings in the Rugby World Cup seem to be over, as lesser teams like Namibia, the United States, Romania and Japan have given bigger teams a scare in early games.
